titles.title: Expressing support for designation of a "Hear My Cry Day" in schools across the United States.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

bill.summary: 7/25/2011--Introduced. Expresses the House of Representatives' support for a Hear My Cry Day in schools across this country to encourage the elimination of bullying from our schools. Encourages school children across the country to recite a pledge against bullying that will be administered by President Barack Obama and Secretary of Education Arne Duncan at noon on that day.
